basics.name: Francisco Cerdas Urena
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm experienced developer, operating on the entire software life cycle, from conception to product release with multiples programming languages. Currently, in love with NodeJS and all the Javascript World (FrontEnd & BackEnd). I like exploring other languages and approaches, so nowadays I spend some time playing with Python, Arduino and Elixir/Erlang. I like the collaborative environments, test driven development, teamwork and modern software patterns. You can check my Github profile, there you can find my personal projects.

work.summary: SOIN is a IT company with prestige nationally and in other countries like Spain, Mexico, El Salvador due to its excellent technological solutions. Part of my work at SOIN involves:
highlights: Develop modules and bug fixes for the SIF, an ERP solution used by big companies
Design, develop and maintain Quecomemos, the biggest food delivery service in Costa Rica, for iOS, Android and Web.
Design, develop and maintain Receta Digital, a web app to control prescriptions, drugs and pharmacies in Costa Rica.
Design, develop and maintain Tapp, the biggest loyalty service and app in Costa Rica.

courses: MongoDB, Inc. - M101JS: MongoDB for Node.js Developers

references.name: Heriberto Ure√±a (burenam17@gmail.com) - coworkers at SOIN
references.reference: It's my pleasure to recommend Francisco, we work together at SOIN and he proved that he will be a valuable professional to any company as web developer.
